title: Implement IRRP eMail requirements for Inhouse/SeCe-IT relocation and SLA after-market sales orders
description:
Description
Process information:
Requirements:
IRRP-eMail texts for Inhouse related relocation orders must be standardized for Inhouse and Voice related products and orders
IRRP-eMail texts for Inhouse related relocation orders must be designed, implemented, tested and deployed to Production
IRRP-eMail texts for Inhouse related SLA after-market sales orders must be designed, implemented, tested and deployed to Production
Link for Documentation in Wiki:
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/SECEIT+Umzug+%2C+SLA+Nachvermarktung
